dict.acceptation: 反射（光、热、声或影像）；考虑；
反射，反照；表达；显示；折转；
映出；反射；深思熟虑；慎重表达；

sent.orig: Polling results like this reflect our culture (cultural) mythology but they don't reflect the facts.
sent.trans: 民意调查只反映了社会文化的神话但它们不能反映事实。

sent.orig: Yet the Rockets reflect his vision the same way the Astros reflect Drayton McLane's.
sent.trans: 火箭队就像同城的太空人队一样时时按他们的老板的意思运作。

sent.orig: Bee venom induced persistent spontaneous nociception was used to reflect spinal cord mediated nociceptive flexor reflect.
sent.trans: 测量两组大鼠左足皮下蜜蜂毒(bee venom,BV)诱致的持续性自发缩足反射，该指标反映脊髓介导的伤害性屈肌反射特性的变化。

sent.orig: Although the dark urine may simply reflect dehydration, it could also reflect bilirubinuria or hemoglobinuria.
sent.trans: 虽然黑尿可以简单地归因于脱水，但是也可以归因于胆红素尿或血红蛋白尿。

sent.orig: Directly to the county government to reflect. Or go to the People's Congress to reflect.
sent.trans: 直接向县政府反映。或是到人大去反映。
